title: 500+ ms and keep attempting to reconnect
body:
Hello,
I have a problem with the League of Legends Client, everytime I try to play it keep telling me "attempting to reconnect". It started yesterday 13 August 2016, I tested on a custom game and it reconnects for a bit but when I try to move the champion the message appears again. What is the problem? 
I put a link with a screen shot.

replies.body:
It appears you may be experiencing either packet loss or high packet buffering. This is usually caused by either problematic local network settings or ISP routing issues. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this for good.

Let me know if you noticed any changes after taking those steps.
